name: Atsukè
description:
Atsukè is a technology and mobile marketing company. Comprised of 50 mobile experts, our team supports many key accounts, helping them define their mobile strategy and implement their mobile and digital services. We create relational and transactional solutions adapted to the mobile use of your customers. We're to create the new generation of mobile services allowing a trade and an omnichannel customer relation.
It is injected into projects to meet user needs or measurable marketing objectives.
